00006 package ScheatorDb;
00007 import java.util.LinkedHashMap;
00008 import java.sql.*;
00009 
00014 public class Matches extends DbObject {
00015 
00016     private static final String[] TABLES = {"Match", "Season", "Team home", "Team away"};
00017     private static final String[] FIELDS =
00018     {"match.Id AS matchId",
00019      "season.id AS seasonId",
00020      "home.name as home_team",
00021      "away.name as away_team",
00022      "match_no"};
00023     private static final String[] ID_FIELDS =
00024     { "seasonId",
00025       "home.id",
00026       "away.id"
00027     };
00028 
00029     private static final String[] ORDER_BY = {"match_no"};
00030     
00031     Matches() {
00032         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00033         db = new MySqlDb();
00034     }
00035 
00036     Matches(int seasonId) {
00037         list = new LinkedHashMap<Integer, Data>();
00038         db = new MySqlDb();
00039         fetch(seasonId);
00040     }
00041 
00042     public void fetch(int seasonId) {
00043         list.clear();
00044         String[] ids = {"seasonId", "match.hometeam", "match.awayteam"};
00045         String query;
00046 
00047         try {
00048             Statement st = db.con.createStatement();
00049             ResultSet rs = st.executeQuery(db.qe.getItems(TABLES, FIELDS, ID_FIELDS, ids, ORDER_BY));
00050             while (rs.next()) {
00051                 String matchId = rs.getString("matchId");
00052                 String sId = rs.getString("seasonId");
00053                 String home_team = rs.getString("home_team");
00054                 String away_team = rs.getString("away_team");
00055                 String match_no = rs.getString("match_no");
00056                 currentId = Integer.parseInt(sId);
00057                 Data team = new Data(Integer.parseInt(matchId.trim()),
00058                         Integer.parseInt(match_no.trim()),
00059                         home_team, away_team);
00060                 list.put(matchId, team);
00061             }
00062         } catch (Exception e) {
00063             System.err.println("Failed to read season data: " + e.toString());
00064         }
00065 
00066     }
00067 
00068     public class Data extends DbObject.Data {
00069         public int field_matchNumber;
00070         public String field_homeTeam;
00071         public String field_awayTeam;
00072 
00073         Data(int id, int match, String home, String away) {
00074             field_id = id;
00075             field_name = "";
00076             field_matchNumber = match;
00077             field_homeTeam = home;
00078             field_awayTeam = away;
00079         }
00080     }
